content.body:
bakkot: Does your Matrix logger work by way of a bot on the channel that parses incoming messages?
Or does it instead parse the https://view.matrix.org/ logs/format?

content.body: Could anyone explain me what kind of difference between top-level browsing context and auxiliary browsing context?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Could anyone explain me what kind of difference between top-level browsing context and auxiliary browsing context?

content.body: Maxim Vaarwel: An auxiliary BC is a type of top-level BC. In particular it's one that was created via window.open() or target="_blank" or similar, i.e. there is an opener/openee relationship.
content.formatted_body: Maxim Vaarwel: An auxiliary BC is a type of top-level BC. In particular it's one that was created via window.open() or target="_blank" or similar, i.e. there is an opener/openee relationship.

content.body: sideshowbarker: it hits the "get messages" API, which does not require the bot to be in the channel
content.formatted_body: sideshowbarker: it hits the "get messages" API, which does not require the bot to be in the channel

content.body: (I should say, does not require the bot to be in the channel as long as the room history is set to be viewable to everyone, not just joined members.)
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: (I should say, does not require the bot to be in the channel as long as the room history is set to be viewable to everyone, not just joined members.)
